data-center-infrastructure.title: Data Center Turnkey

hero.headline: Physical Infrastructure, Delivered & Deployed
hero.subhead: We bridge the gap between procurement and production. From bare metal to blinking lights, we handle the entire physical layer of your data center.

data-center-infrastructure.overview: Our Data Center Turnkey service is a comprehensive fulfillment solution. We don't just ship boxes; we provide Importer of Record (IOR) services, secure logistics, and white-glove rack-and-stack installation certified by major OEMs.

capabilities.title: Global Procurement & IOR
capabilities.description: We act as your Importer of Record in 150+ countries, handling customs, taxes, and compliance so your hardware never gets stuck at the border.

capabilities.title: Precision Rack & Stack
capabilities.description: Certified engineers handle the physical mounting of servers, storage, and switches, adhering to strict thermal and power containment designs.

capabilities.title: Structured Cabling
capabilities.description: ISO/TIA-compliant copper and fiber cabling with neat labeling and cable management, fully tested and certified (Fluke reports included).

capabilities.title: Asset Tagging & CMDB
capabilities.description: Every deployed asset is tagged, scanned, and registered into your Configuration Management Database before we leave the site.

process.title: Site Survey & BOM Validation
process.description: We verify power, cooling, and space availability at the target site and validate the Bill of Materials against physical constraints.

process.title: Procurement & Staging
process.description: Hardware is sourced directly from OEMs and consolidated at our regional staging centers for pre-configuration (BIOS/Firmware).

process.title: Secure Logistics
process.description: Insured freight transport to the data center facility, including lift-gate service and unboxing debris removal.

process.title: Installation & Handover
process.description: Physical installation, cabling, power-on self-test (POST), and handover of As-Built documentation.

edge-iot-infrastructure.title: Industrial Edge & IoT

hero.headline: Compute Where the Data Lives
hero.subhead: Ruggedized infrastructure for harsh environments. We deploy gateways, sensors, and edge servers to factories, oil rigs, and smart cities.

edge-iot-infrastructure.overview: Deploying IT in non-IT environments requires specialized engineering. We design and install ruggedized edge computing solutions that withstand vibration, dust, and extreme temperatures.

capabilities.title: Ruggedized Engineering
capabilities.description: Hardware selection focused on fanless designs, IP67 ratings, and shock resistance for industrial deployments.

capabilities.title: Remote Out-of-Band Mgmt
capabilities.description: Cellular (LTE/5G) OOB management to ensure you can reach your edge nodes even if the primary network fails.

capabilities.title: Field Installation Services
capabilities.description: Our field techs are certified for industrial sites (PPE/Safety) to mount enclosures, run conduit, and install antennas.

capabilities.title: Zero-Touch Provisioning
capabilities.description: Systems ship pre-configured to phone home and download their configuration automatically upon power-up.

process.title: Environmental Assessment
process.description: Analyzing site conditions (power, connectivity, hazards) to select the appropriate NEMA/IP rated enclosures.

process.title: Pilot Deployment
process.description: Deploying a small proof-of-concept cluster to validate connectivity and thermal performance.

process.title: Fleet Rollout
process.description: Mass deployment across hundreds of sites using coordinated field engineering teams.

process.title: Centralized Acceptance
process.description: Verifying all nodes have checked into the central management plane before sign-off.

network-connectivity.title: Enterprise Networking

hero.headline: Connecting Your Global Workforce
hero.subhead: Standardized office IT and networking delivered globally. From SD-WAN rollouts to high-density Wi-Fi.

network-connectivity.overview: We handle the physical layer of your enterprise network. Whether it's a campus refresh or a new branch opening, we ensure standardized equipment and cabling across all your locations.

capabilities.title: SD-WAN Deployment
capabilities.description: Physical installation of edge routers and uCPEs to enable software-defined wide area networking.

capabilities.title: Wi-Fi Heatmapping
capabilities.description: Predictive and active site surveys to design high-density wireless networks with zero dead zones.

capabilities.title: Campus Switching
capabilities.description: Designing and stacking core, distribution, and access layer switches for high-throughput LANs.

capabilities.title: Smart Hands Support
capabilities.description: On-demand dispatch of technicians for break-fix, patch cabling, or equipment swaps.

process.title: Standardization
process.description: Defining a global hardware catalog to ensure consistency across all branch offices.

process.title: Site Prep
process.description: Coordinating with local ISPs and electricians to ensure circuits and power are ready.

process.title: Installation Sprint
process.description: Rapid deployment of switching, Wi-Fi, and firewall gear over a weekend to minimize disruption.

process.title: Day 1 Support
process.description: On-site standby support during the first day of operations to resolve immediate user issues.

hybrid-cloud-hardware.title: Hybrid Cloud Hardware

hero.headline: The Cloud, On Your Premises
hero.subhead: Deploying AWS Outposts, Azure Stack, and Google Anthos hardware in your private data center.

hybrid-cloud-hardware.overview: For regulated industries or latency-sensitive workloads, the public cloud isn't enough. We procure and install the specialized hardware required to run hyperscale cloud stacks in your own facility.

capabilities.title: Site Readiness Assessment
capabilities.description: Verifying your facility meets the strict power, cooling, and weight requirements for HCI appliances.

capabilities.title: Appliance Installation
capabilities.description: Rolling in and powering up pre-integrated racks like AWS Outposts or Azure Stack Hub.

capabilities.title: Network Integration
capabilities.description: Configuring top-of-rack switches and Direct Connect / ExpressRoute links for hybrid connectivity.

capabilities.title: Secure Decommissioning
capabilities.description: When hardware reaches end-of-life, we handle secure wiping and certified recycling.

process.title: Workload Analysis
process.description: Determining which workloads need to stay on-prem and sizing the hardware accordingly.

process.title: Facility Prep
process.description: Upgrading power feeds and reinforcing floors to support dense HCI racks.

process.title: White-Glove Delivery
process.description: Specialized logistics to transport sensitive pre-racked equipment.

process.title: Cloud Tethering
process.description: Connecting the local hardware to the public cloud control plane.

security-physical.title: Physical Security Systems

hero.headline: Protecting Your Physical Assets
hero.subhead: Integrated access control, video surveillance, and environmental monitoring for critical facilities.

security-physical.overview: Cybersecurity starts at the front door. We design and install comprehensive physical security systems that integrate with your IT identity providers for seamless access management.

capabilities.title: Access Control Systems
capabilities.description: Badge readers, biometric scanners, and turnstiles integrated with your AD/Okta directory.

capabilities.title: IP Video Surveillance
capabilities.description: High-definition CCTV networks with AI-powered analytics for anomaly detection.

capabilities.title: Environmental Monitoring
capabilities.description: Sensors for temperature, humidity, and water leaks in server rooms and wiring closets.

capabilities.title: Intrusion Detection
capabilities.description: Motion sensors, glass break detectors, and door contacts linked to a central alarm panel.

process.title: Threat Assessment
process.description: Identifying physical vulnerabilities in your facility's perimeter and interior.

process.title: System Design
process.description: Planning camera angles and sensor placement for maximum coverage.

process.title: Cabling & Mounting
process.description: Running low-voltage cabling and mounting hardware discreetly.

process.title: Integration & Training
process.description: Connecting systems to the network and training security staff on the VMS.

workplace-it.title: Global Workplace IT

hero.headline: Empowering Your Workforce
hero.subhead: Standardized end-user compute and collaboration tools delivered to employees worldwide.

workplace-it.overview: Managing IT assets for a distributed workforce is a logistical nightmare. We handle the procurement, warehousing, imaging, and shipping of laptops and peripherals to employee homes or offices globally.

capabilities.title: Device-as-a-Service
capabilities.description: Procurement and lifecycle management of laptops, monitors, and docks on a monthly opex model.

capabilities.title: Kitting & Logistics
capabilities.description: Bundling laptops with swag and accessories, then shipping directly to new hires.

capabilities.title: Meeting Room Solutions
capabilities.description: Standardized AV setups for huddle rooms, boardrooms, and all-hands spaces.

capabilities.title: E-Waste Recycling
capabilities.description: Secure retrieval and certified destruction of old assets to meet environmental standards.

process.title: Catalog Definition
process.description: Selecting standard laptop models (Mac/PC) and peripherals for different user personas.

process.title: Inventory Stocking
process.description: Pre-purchasing stock in regional hubs to ensure rapid delivery for new hires.

process.title: Order Fulfillment
process.description: Pick, pack, and ship upon ticket request from your HR/IT system.

process.title: Lifecycle Support
process.description: Handling repairs, loaner devices, and eventual retirement.
